Uses of Package
com.linkedin.helix.model

Packages that use com.linkedin.helix.model
com.linkedin.helix Provide the classes necessary to create a Helix cluster manager 
com.linkedin.helix.controller Helix cluster controller 
com.linkedin.helix.controller.stages Stages in Helix controller pipelines 
com.linkedin.helix.examples Examples of using Helix cluster manager 
com.linkedin.helix.manager.file A file-based implementation of Helix cluster manager (Deprecated) 
com.linkedin.helix.manager.zk zookeeper-based implementation of Helix cluster manager 
com.linkedin.helix.messaging Helix message handling classes 
com.linkedin.helix.messaging.handling Helix default implementation for handling state transition messages and controller messages 
com.linkedin.helix.model Helix classes for all types of znodes 
com.linkedin.helix.monitoring.mbeans Helix jmx bean classes 
com.linkedin.helix.participant Helix implementation of participant classes 
com.linkedin.helix.participant.statemachine Helix state model definitions for participant 
com.linkedin.helix.spectator Helix default implementation of a cluster spectator 
com.linkedin.helix.tools Helix tools classes 
com.linkedin.helix.util Helix utility classes 
 

Classes in com.linkedin.helix.model used by com.linkedin.helix
CurrentState
          Current states of partitions in a resource
ExternalView
          External view is an aggregation (across all instances) of current states for the partitions in a resource

          The ideal states of all partition in a resource

          Instance configurations
LiveInstance
          Instance that connects to zookeeper
Message
          Message class basically extends ZNRecord but provides additional fields
StateModelDefinition
          Describe the state model
